title: KYCProfile
description: Know Your Customer (KYC) information for regulatory and risk management.

kycId.description: Unique identifier for this KYC profile.

riskRating.description: Overall KYC risk rating for the customer.

lastReviewedAt.description: Timestamp when the KYC profile was last reviewed.

reviewer.description: Identifier or name of the person who performed the last KYC review.
